cities.name: Seville
cities.description: Seville is gaining recognition in the specialty coffee scene, with local roasters and cafes embracing high-quality beans and innovative brewing methods.

cities.name: Barcelona
cities.description: Barcelona is a hub for specialty coffee in Spain, with a strong presence of third wave cafes and artisan roasters that promote sustainable sourcing.

cities.name: Madrid
cities.description: Madrid blends tradition and innovation in its coffee culture, offering both classic cafés and a growing number of specialty coffee shops.

cities.name: Valencia
cities.description: Valencia’s coffee culture is thriving, with local baristas focusing on quality beans and alternative brewing methods.

cities.name: Rome
cities.description: Rome offers a unique blend of traditional Italian espresso culture and a slow emergence of specialty coffee spots.

cities.name: Milan
cities.description: Milan is Italy’s fashion and coffee capital, where espresso is an everyday ritual and specialty cafés are making their mark.

cities.name: Naples
cities.description: Naples is considered the birthplace of Italian espresso, with a strong cultural identity tied to traditional coffee bars.

cities.name: Paris
cities.description: Paris is at the heart of France’s specialty coffee revolution, featuring micro-roasters and cafes that highlight origin and brewing precision.

cities.name: Lyon
cities.description: Lyon has embraced specialty coffee with a growing number of third wave cafés and appreciation for sustainable practices.

cities.name: Berlin
cities.description: Berlin is a major center for specialty coffee in Europe, known for its innovative roasters and international café culture.

cities.name: Hamburg
cities.description: Hamburg has a historic connection to coffee as a major port city and continues to play a key role in coffee import and roasting.

cities.name: Lisbon
cities.description: Lisbon combines a strong café culture with a recent surge in specialty coffee shops and local roasters.

cities.name: Porto
cities.description: Porto is emerging as a destination for specialty coffee lovers, with cafés that prioritize origin and quality.
